title: List of all Android audio record  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android audio record  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidAudioRecorder
repoList.description: A fancy audio recorder lib for Android. Supports WAV format at 48kHz.

repoList.name: AndroidRecording
repoList.description: Android Recording library offers convenient tools for audio/video recording and playback

repoList.name: ReactiveAudioRecord
repoList.description: Rx wrapper library for Android's AudioRecord API. (aka RxAudioRecord)

repoList.name: Android-Wave-Recorder
repoList.description: A powerful and efficient library to record WAVE form audio files (WAV) in Android

repoList.name: LiveHiddenCamera
repoList.description: Live Hidden Camera is a library which record live video and audio from Android device without displaying a preview.

repoList.name: RecordHelper
repoList.description: Android Recording library offers convenient tools for audio/video recording and playback.

repoList.name: audio-recorder
repoList.description: Android library for audio recorder

repoList.name: OboeAudioRecorder
repoList.description: This is a sample project that uses Google Oboe Library for recording the MIC input of an Android device and write the recorded data to a .WAV file.

repoList.name: Aucoder
repoList.description: Library that allows to record audio from microphone in Android.

repoList.name: SpectraAudioRecorderAndroid
repoList.description: Android Library for high definition audio recording.

repoList.description: A fancy audio recorder lib for Android. Supports WAV format at 48kHz.
